name: Stacks Info
description:
### Stacks Info

With this extension you can view all the info about your stacks

You can then use a function efter this block to manipulate and filter all the data you need to use it.

name: Export Docker-compose
description:
### Stack Export

With this extension you can export the docker-compose.yml of your stack
You need to configure this block with the id of your stack
(you can use "Stack Info" block to take it.
